title: Do Not Disturb feature Bug Pixel 4 XL
content: I would like to report a bug on the Do Not Disturb feature in my Pixel 4 XL. When an exception like allowing calls from starred contacts or repeat callers is "On",  calls from whats app overrides DND and always rings from any caller. This is quite annoying. Please fix soon as possible.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
